name: tateca-backend-api-specs
description: Tateca API OpenAPI specifications and Postman collections

scripts.build-docs: redocly build-docs openapi/openapi.yaml --title "Tateca API Documentation" --output docs/index.html
scripts.build-docs:redoc: redocly build-docs openapi/openapi.yaml --title "Tateca API Documentation" --output docs/redoc.html
scripts.dev: npm run bundle && npm run build-docs && npm run serve
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run bundle
scripts.test:docs: npm run build-docs && test -f docs/index.html && echo 'Documentation built successfully'
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run build-docs && npm run build-docs:redoc
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run bundle && npm run build-docs && npm run generate:postman
